attributes.action: Keep schools closed until the virus is under control
attributes.additional_details:
I understand that education is important but so is the health of the children and teachers etc
As a parent who suffers with anxiety and has a child who suffers with anxiety also this whole covid hell has taken a toll on our mental health 
Given the choice I would not send my children to school but am scared that I will get fined this in itself has also not helped our mental health and we struggle daily with sending our children to school scared anxious and at times in tears
attributes.background: I would like the schools to be closed until the covid virus is under control and way below the r rate or give the parents the choice if they want to send them or not without being faced with a fine

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550846

The latest guidance on schools returning in January is available here: https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/schools-and-childcare-settings-return-in-january-2021/schools-and-childcare-settings-return-in-january-2021
